name: SWAT Police car vs Grand Rokeman Crime Simulator
name_original: SWAT Police car vs Grand Rokeman Crime Simulator
description:
SWAT Police car vs Grand Rokeman Crime Simulator

Welcome SWAT police car to your first day as a law enforcement officer, today you are going to learn everything about chasing down criminal suspects in real police Crime City simulator.

In this newest extreme car driving simulator you have to chase the outlaws in your police car.
Drive police cars. Get in your car, chase enemies, and earn money.

There's no need to use brakes, nitro boost your police sports cars onto so many of unique stunts and tricks to perform the world's most amazing stunts.
you'll get to experience realistic car damage by hitting into obstacles and crashing cars to see full body damage.

key features:

=> Beautiful 3D graphics
=> Extreme precision driving simulator
=> Entertaining gameplay
=> Authentic police car lights and sounds
